mapper.update: update travel_destination set destination_name = #{destinationName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_date = #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, total_day = #{totalDay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, vehicle_type = #{vehicleType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, destination_name, start_date, total_day, vehicle_type, remark, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time from travel_destination where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, destination_name, start_date, total_day, vehicle_type, remark, create_user, update_user, create_time, update_time from travel_destination
